Get to API stability for the Job, JobSpec, etc structs so that we can turn on persistence without being unable to upgrade nodes in future, and for the yaml/json versions too - IOW, change whatever we want to change before we commit to the API
Turn on persistence by implementing a sqlite version of the localdb - right now when we restart a bacalhau server it forgets everything! so upgrades e.g. break `bacalhau list` etc
Need a Publisher failover mechanism
Estuary publisher should be more resilient
